text: Answer: (d) Solution: Zero length string is 0 One length string is 1 which is ‘@’ Two length string is 4 which is ab, ba, ac, ca Check for option C $2=2.81+(321-S22) =2.1+(3-0) = 2+3=5 So option C is false Check for option D Su= 2.8t + (3%1= Si) $2=2.81+(321-S2.1) =2+3-1 =4 So option D is true.
